Articles.Content:
Not only one of the best first person shooters of all time, but also absolutely free and on Steam. Yes, of course, I am talking about Quake Live (and Quake 3 for those of age). An absolutely amazing incarnation of a legendary game series with a murdering pace few, if any, modern games can match. Even after 15 years, it still has hordes of fans. Do you want nail biting tension and a blood pressure that makes your doctor cry? Quake is your game.

Go to the website here or download it from Steam here.

Any old-timers here? Newbies? Good stories?
Nice texture replacement for the other players. I knew a guy who did the same in UT2004; made it really easy to see when the reticle was in the right place.

That green one is actually the stock enemy model and texture for Quake Live. They learnt something from Quake 3 and the antics of its players There are more tricks to make the environment less flashy to help you focus on a fight. I tend to play with settings that absolutely do not please the eye, but that remove as many as possible environmental factors. It is all about gameplay, not pretty pictures. Plus it reminds me of the old days

No more love for such an awesome and free game?

The good news is that I own Hardcore bots after a little practice. The bad news it that this does not translate to wins online
